name: Red Potatoes
ingredients: 3 Tbsp. of oil on the bottom of a 9x13 pan
3 T of garlic (minced). Basil, parsley and oregano, 1 Tbsp. of each. Sprinkle on the bottom of the pan.
steps: Put cut up potatoes on top of it and mix it all up, coating the potatoes. Mix a few times as it cooks.
Cover with foil at 450 for 45-­‐60 minutes.
